section.title: Economy Package
section.p: Includes round-trip airfare, budget accommodation in Bangkok, and a city tour covering major temples and markets. Street food options available.

section.title: Mid-range Package
section.p: Includes round-trip airfare, 4-star hotel in Bangkok, a guided tour of Ayutthaya, and a Thai cooking class. Includes dining at popular mid-range restaurants.

section.title: Luxury Package
section.p: First-class airfare, 5-star resort stay in Phuket, private yacht tour to Phi Phi Islands, spa treatments, and gourmet Thai dining.
